summary: An ex-convict (Tyrese) gets tangled up with a gang after his car is hijacked with his son inside.
cast: Tyrese Gibson|Shawn Parr|Henry Hunter Hall|Johnny C. Pruitt|Meagan Good|Darris Love|Larenz Tate|William Duffy|Game|Kimora Lee Simmons|DeWayne Turrentine Jr.|Paul Terrell Clayton|Ray Bengston|Earl Minfield|Dagmar Stansova|Kasi Lemmons|Laura Miro|Thommy Abate|Dawn Reavis|Dylan Tays|Yolanda 'Yo-Yo' Whittaker|Julio Gonzalez|Michael Eric Dyson|Misty Alli|Cecelia Antoinette|Erik Betts|Christopher Carrington|Schatar Sapphira Collier|Julius Denem|Johnny Drocco|Aldo Gonzalez|Vernon Hawthorne|Farley Jackson|Janis Jones|Jensen LeFlore|Sean Anthony Moran|Carolena Sabah|Don Salmon|Michelle Stevenson|Axe Osei Vita|Oba Vita|Arnold Vosloo|John West Jr.|Jose Yenque
director: Director: Vondie Curtis-Hall (as Vondie Curtis Hall)
title: Sin salida
